conversations.body_text: Hi Josep PC,  What is the correct format? Should the area code be included?

Is 676078885 instead of 656078885

El El mié, 31 dic 2025 a las 4:36, service@simsonn.com

Hi Josep PC,    Sorry, your order has already been shipped, so we can no longer modify the phone number. Should any issues arise with the logistics, we will contact you via email to assist with the final delivery details. Wishing you a smooth process and a Happy New Year!

For you too!
Thanks

El El mié, 31 dic 2025 a las 9:08, service@simsonn.com

Hello,

Lost, never received and the company does not answer and says the shipment
does not exist anymore.
Please could I have a refund?

Thanks.

Josep

Hi Josep PC,    I apologize for the delayed response. Here is the tracking link for your final leg of delivery. I noticed the address appears to be incorrect. Please contact your local carrier as soon as possible. Thank you for your cooperation.  https://global.cainiao.com/newDetail.htm?mailNoList=0280010280017022088743&otherMailNoList=

They don't give a damn if they deliver it or not.
How may time I have to wait before purchasing again?


El El jue, 15 ene 2026 a las 10:54, service@simsonn.com
Hi Josep PC,    They likely couldn't reach you during delivery. You can call them to provide your correct number and request a redelivery. Please note that this error was not caused by us.
